website_summaries.verdict: Provides a measuring gauge along with a tee design, making it more versatile than other models.
pros: No extra tools are required for set-up
Includes high-quality materials for excellent safety levels
Compatible with the most common propane tank connector
Color-coded gauge is easy to read
cons: More expensive than some other gauges

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how accurate the gauge appears to read. My 20Lb propane was near empty and I ran it dry watching the gauge accurately show the diminishing quantity. The only down side is that you can't use a 'tree' on one side as the valve will rotate due to the greater weight on the side with the tree connection. This really only matters if you are trying to put a lantern on top the 'tree' though.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Functional product
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the preformance of the product as in it properly displays pressure and works as described but the first rain we had the display glass filled with condensation and it’s difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Y valve works great!
customer_reviews.text: As seen in the photos. Well made brass fittings are tighten nicely. Gages work properly. Gave item five 🌟 fast delivery also.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Wondergem

customer_reviews.title: Happy campers
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased worked on the camper excellently this past weekend.I was actually surprised in how accurate the gauge was because they are usually off in there true reading of the propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This works great, but the gauge leaks and water has infiltrated. It fogs up in humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and convenient
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient to have this propane adapter if you have another stove next to your grill and it seems accurate measuring the content of your tank.
customer_reviews.author: gengenn

customer_reviews.title: This product works great and it's so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It lets me run my BBQ and my 3 burner stove off the same propane tank when camping. It's so convenient. I wish I would have bought one sooner! It's a must have for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the person who got it days it works good.
customer_reviews.author: wkfourniersr

customer_reviews.title: That'll do pig.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Perfect for my need for a splitter and a gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, I received it in record time and it is just as it was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this product very much. It was built to last
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Gauge level
customer_reviews.text: I run my heater and camping stove at the same time. The fuel gauge is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple splitter, inaccurate gauge
customer_reviews.text: Worked great - simple splitter from 1 propane tank to two appliances. The gauge is slightly off (brand new tank shows 1/2 full)
customer_reviews.author: MamaA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Use it to transfer gas between my grill and a gas fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Buzzelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to split your propane to two different devices.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. West

customer_reviews.title: Great for Two Gas Burning
customer_reviews.text: Great for running to gas appliances at once. Have to have both hooked up at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to use the y or v connector. Instead of 2 propane gas tank, it use only one thank. I like it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Trinidad/ akucinta

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great , you can run a grill and a burner at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent y-splitter adapter for your large propane tank!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this y-splitter adapter so that I could connect two propane appliances to a large tank when we camp. Met all my expectations. I really like to low fuel indicator. No longer a guessing game when we're getting low!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Miller

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 10 months don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit since January 19. Just came home to gas smell by bbq and one side or adaptor randomly started leaking. Glad I noticed it. Not made well and don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling R. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Works, gauge reads wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Gauge reads "low" on brand new, full 40 lb tank. Otherwise looks/functions ok. I like that it has covers for both outlet fitting👍🏻.
customer_reviews.author: CJA

customer_reviews.title: easy install, does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on my tank on the horse trailer so I can have a hose running to the hot water heater and the buddy heater at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Keller

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was able to use both units simultaneously. Gas gauge is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and gauge seems to right on
customer_reviews.author: Jhgh14

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use easy to install, as for the accuracy of the Guage, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bbasso

customer_reviews.title: Leaks on one side ???
customer_reviews.text: When I had both lines hooked up. One of them kept leaking. I couldn’t use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHEREA

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: After three months of use. Only used it one time... it started leaking didn’t discover it until after the return window was closed
customer_reviews.author: Brian HEINDL

product_meta.title: GASLAND Propane Tank Gauge, Propane Tank Splitter Adapter with Gauge, QCC1 Type1 Dual Propane Tank Gauge, LP Gas Adapter Y-Splitter Tee Grill Connector for Propane Cylinder, RV Camper, BBQ Gas Grill
feature_bullets: 🎁【HIGH QUALITY, MORE SAFER】 When it comes to our propane tank gauge, we make a point of using nothing but the best materials available, along with state-of-the-art production processes and strict quality and safety control procedures. That way we can be certain they meet the high standards and expectations of our customers.

🎁【DURABLE, MONEY SAVING】 High quality materials and advanced manufacturing technology improves the safety factor of the propane tank gauge. With a gas leak detector, this propane tank tee is sealed well to ensure your personal safety when using. Durable propane meter lasts so you always have an easy way to cook with more propane.

🎁【CONVENIENT, EASY TO INSTALL】 No tools needed, Installed with an indicator, will let you know exactly when to fill up your propane tank. You can easily install the propane adapter propane tank adapter with the plastic hand wheel to save more time and money. If you just don't want to carry big tank around With this adapter no more carry of heavy and uncomfortable 20lb propane tank for outdoor cooking.

🎁【MULTIFUNCTION, BEST SOLUTION】 This propane tank gauge is compatible with QCC1/Type1 Connection. Propane tank tee propane tank gauge is the best solution for gas appliances, camping, RV camper, cylinder, BBQ gas grill, etc.
🎁【Excellent Customer Service】We have professional team to offer you excellent service. If you have any question, please feel free to contact us from Monday to Firday.
